CLICK TO EDIT

Editing content in our composer is fairly easy. Justclick on the content you want to alter and it willloadthe edit window for your selected content.

CONTENT MODULES

Since the editor is very flexible and extendablevia custom modules, we focused on the maincontent types you need to create your project.

[ceimage class="live-image" style="margin-left: -0px;" id="48" alt="layer_2_img" lightbox="no"][/ceimage]
[ceimage class="live-image" id="49" alt="layer_3_icon" lightbox="no"][/ceimage]

CUSTOM FONTSETS

Ever dreamed of working with your favoritewebfonts ina content editor? We made itpossible, supportingall available font services.

[ceimage class="live-image" style="margin-left: -32px;" id="50" alt="layer_3_img" lightbox="no"][/ceimage]

SOME SUPPORTED SITES

[ceimage class="live-image" id="51" alt="layer_3_img_2" lightbox="no"][/ceimage]

CONTENT LAYERS

Each content layer you add consists of a full widthcontainer you can fully customize. This way you have thousands of option to layout your page.

[ceimage class="live-image" style="margin-left: -0px;" id="53" alt="layer_4_img" lightbox="no"][/ceimage]
[ceimage class="live-image" id="54" alt="layer_5_icon" lightbox="no"][/ceimage]

RE-ORDER

To keep everything organized you can define a name for every layer and re-order them as you like.In the grid you always see which layer is active.

[ceimage class="live-image" style="margin-left: -19.5px;" id="55" alt="layer_5_img" lightbox="no"][/ceimage]
